        public Tower(char towerId,
             int costToBuy,
             int level,
             int range,
             int costToSell,
             int costToUpgrade,
             int attackStrategy,
             int damage,
             int maxAttackDelay,
             int towerAttackType)
        Parameters:
        towerId - tower id
        costToBuy - cost of tower to buy
        level - tower level
        range - tower range
        costToSell - cost of tower to sell
        costToUpgrade - cost of tower to upgrade
        attackStrategy - tower's attacking Startegy
        damage - damage it causes to enemy
        maxAttackDelay - after how much delay it attacks again
        towerAttackType - tower's attacking type
